name: Santa Claus Adventures: The North Pole Village
name_original: Santa Claus Adventures: The North Pole Village
description:
Santa Claus has to collect all gifts, that are floating on the sky. Please help him.

Game is developed for Android. HTML is only for preview.

Be carefull! Don't fall into the Clouds, this collision will cause, that ice will cover your screen! It's hard to navigate when you don't see anything, isn't it?

Don't fall into the Wind! Do this only in one case - when you like to play very fast!

Watch out the buildings! Collision will destroy Santa's sledge.

Please, avoid falling into the chimney's smoke! Air near the chimney is warm and will carry you up!

Can you collect more gifts than others? Help Santa Claus!
